\documentclass{report}
\usepackage{pythontex}
\usepackage{tabularx}

% Error: Need to construct entire tabularx table in Python
% https://github.com/gpoore/pythontex/issues/25#issuecomment-26922469
% \begin{noindent}
\begin{pycode}
def get_table_contents():
	return """
		\\hline
		Header 1 & Header 2
	"""
\end{pycode}
% \end{noindent}

\begin{document}
\begin{tabularx}{\linewidth}{|X|X|}
	\py{get_table_contents()}
\end{tabularx}
\end{document}
